citation: Education and Care Services National Law (Tasmania) (Tas)
text:
Education and Care Services National Law (Tasmania)

The Education and Care Services National Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the Education and Care Services National Law Act 2010 of Victoria is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Education and Care Services National Law (Application) Act 2011 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the Education and Care Services National Law (Tasmania)

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the Education and Care Services National Law were applied as a law of Tasmania on 1 January 2012.

2. Further information
    The full text of the Education and Care Services National Law is set out in the Schedule to the Education and Care Services National Law Act 2010 of Victoria (click on INFORMATION for a link to Victorian legislation). See the Education and Care Services National Law (Application) Act 2011 for modifications to the Education and Care Services National Law as it applies in Tasmania.
